General.Name: Shanghai Chuangli Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Chuangli Group Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, sells, and services coal mining machinery and equipment in China and internationally. It offers excavation equipment, new intelligent pumping station systems, transmission/communication products, control products, electro-hydraulic control products, brackets, TBM full face hard rock tunnelling and scraper machines, and other products. The company also provides fully mechanized mining and excavation automation system, smart mine construction, emulsion and spray pumping station, outfit, and mine engineering solutions. Shanghai Chuangli Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
